mapper.select: SELECT UUID() AS id, scg.goods_id, g.`name`AS goods_name, sum(sc.goods_count) AS num, sc.machine_id, DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS submit_time FROM inno72_supply_channel_goods scg LEFT JOIN inno72_supply_channel sc ON sc.id = scg.supply_channel_id LEFT JOIN inno72_goods g ON scg.goods_id = g.id INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT img.goods_id,m.id AS machine_id FROM inno72_interact_machine_goods img LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine im ON im.id = img.interact_machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine_time imt ON im.id = imt.interact_machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON m.id = im.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact i ON i.id =im.interact_id WHERE i.is_delete=0 AND i.`status`=1 AND NOW() BETWEEN imt.start_time AND imt.end_time UNION SELECT apg.prize_id AS goods_id,m.id AS machine_id FROM inno72_activity_plan_game_result apg LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan ap ON ap.id = apg.activity_plan_id LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan_machine apm ON apm.activity_plan_id = apg.activity_plan_id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON m.id = apm.machine_id WHERE ap.is_delete = 0 AND apg.prize_type = 1 AND NOW( ) BETWEEN ap.start_time AND ap.end_time ) m GROUP BY machine_id,goods_id )m ON m.goods_id=scg.goods_id AND m.machine_id=sc.machine_id WHERE sc.is_delete=0 GROUP BY sc.machine_id,scg.goods_id ORDER BY sc.machine_id
